IX.iii.1.l.6.
f
.
Interest on Irrevocable Burial Trusts
Certain prepaid burial plans, often characterized as irrevocable burial trusts, earn interest that is added to the value of the policy to offset the effects of inflation.Â  Typically, the interest earned is not available to the holder of the policy.
Do not count the interest on such a burial plan if it is not available to the VA claimant.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
